org.openbel.framework.core.df.encryption
Interface EncryptionService

All Known Subinterfaces:
AsymmetricEncryptionService, SymmetricEncryptionService
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractEncryptionService, AesEncryptionServiceImpl, KamStoreEncryptionServiceImpl, RsaEncryptionServiceImpl
public interface EncryptionService

Provides basic encryption support for both asymmetric and symmetric encryption used in the BEL framework.

Author:
tchu

Method Summary
 void decrypt(InputStream input, OutputStream output)
          Decrypts the input stream with the system key, write the result to the output stream.

encrypt

String encrypt(String message,
               String key,
               String iv)
               throws EncryptionServiceException
Encrypts a message with the specified key and base64 encode the encrypted message.

Parameters:
message - the string to be encrypted
key - key used to encrypt the message
iv - initialization vector to use
Returns:
base64 encoded encrypted message

EncryptionServiceException

encrypt

void encrypt(InputStream input,
             OutputStream output,
             String key,
             String iv)
             throws EncryptionServiceException
Encrypts the input stream with the specified key, write the result to the output stream. Encryption service provides two sets of encryption/decryption operations: One for byte-based operations and one for stream-based operations.

Parameters:
input - unencrypted message stream
output - encrypted message stream
key - key used to encrypt the message
iv - initialization vector to use
Throws:
EncryptionServiceException

                                             throws EncryptionServiceException
Creates a new CipherOutputStream suitable for encryption.

Parameters:

Returns:

Throws:
